p: IP2-ATLANTA trial was approved by the HRA Wales REC 5 (19/WA0005). IP2-ATLANTA is funded by the Wellcome Trust (204998/Z/16/Z). The study will be monitored periodically by trial monitors to assess the progress of the study, verify adherence to the protocol, ICH GCP E6 guidelines and other national/international requirements and to review the completeness, accuracy and consistency of the data.
